Package: uniandes.unacloud.db

[Java] Class VirtualMachineImageManager

    • uniandes.unacloud.db.VirtualMachineImageManager

    • Class used to execute query, update and delete processes in database for VirtualMachine entity. added some queries for Repository and Hypervisor entities

      Authors:
      CesarF
